rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {FNA1201, FNA1211, PTG1511, PTG1512, PTG1531, PTG1542, PTG2513, PTG2514, PTG2523, PTG2524, PTG3515, PTG3516}

proh: Must not have achieved a pass in any of the following: PTG1511, PTG1512, PTG1531 or PTG1542
unitName: Painting as an interdisciplinary practice A
description: This unit introduces students who are not taking painting as a major study to the practice and theory of Painting as a means of contemporary creative expression. By providing the means to achieve an initial level of competence within the Painting discipline it forms a sound conceptual and technical basis for an ongoing continuing study in Painting. It also lays the groundwork for developing interdisciplinary approaches and extending the discipline of Painting into wider fields of practice.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
